description: Sebastian Kane knows how to command his boys; no restraints, no restrictions, just pure control over Leo Foxx. Finally Leo is made to sit on Sebastian and support himself using just his arms whilst Sebastian brings him to climax. Leo is then made to endure a cum facial from both Sebastian AND Ashton Bradley.
title: Ashton Bradley & Leo Foxx
